socketMonitoringDesc: Monitors and visualizes live socket connections and data flow. It provides instant updates on connection status, message traffic, and server performance using WebSockets. The dashboard offers connection logs and alerts to help developers track and debug socket activities efficiently.
networkOff: It appears that your browser has just been set off the internet. Check your network accessories (WiFi, router, etc...) and make sure you are correctly connected to the internet.
authFailedDesc: You're not authenticated. Authentication is strongly required before getting access to the resource you request.
requestLaunchError: An error occurred while trying to contact the remote server. Check your internet connection and try again.
socketConnectionLost: The direct access to the server has been interrupted. Check your internet connection.
requestTimeoutDesc: Unable to contact the remote server. Check your internet network then try again.
authenticationExpired: Your authentication is expired. Re-login you to refresh your user session.
notFoundDesc: The resource you try to access is either unavailable or unexisting.
internalErrorDesc: It seems an internal error gets throw for this operation.
badRequestDesc: The given input(s) are invalid or some of them are required.
requestErrorDesc: An error occurred during the procedure. Please try again.
unauthorizeMessage: You are not authorized to use the service you request.
successFulCopyToClipboard: The content has been copy to clipboard.
browserNotOnline: Your browser is not connected to the InternetüôÅ.
copyToClipboardFailed: Failed to copy content to the clipboard.
networkOn: Your browser has just connected to the internet.
